nodes.text: Niffla was a female Toydarian information broker.

In 137 ABY, she sold information to Imperial Admiral Dru Valan about Gial Gahan's part in Gar Stazi's plan to capture the Imperious, an Imperious-class Star Destroyer that was under construction at the Mon Calamari Shipyards. She also informed Valan that Gahan's niece, Monia, was a pilot in the famed Rogue Squadron of the Galactic Alliance Remnant.
Valan ordered Niffla to be confined to the brig of his ship to avoid her leaking the information to anyone else.
